text: This is Unit 12 of Pimsleur Speak and Read Essential French 1.
Je vous revois Pierre, à demain.
In this conversation, you heard the word « dit » meaning « tell me ».
Dites Marie, est-ce que vous voudriez manger avec moi ce soir ?
Pas ce soir Pierre, mais demain soir je veux bien.
D'accord. À quelle heure ? À 8 heures ?
D'accord. Demain soir à 7 heures, chez moi.
Do you remember how to say this evening ?
Ask what time it is now.
At 5 o'clock, I'm going to eat.
I'm going to eat with you.
Yes, I would like to eat too.
Are you going to drink wine ?
Est-ce que vous allez boire du vin ?
No, I'm going to drink beer.
Non, je vais boire de la bière.
Je vais boire de la bière.
I'm not going to drink today.
Je ne vais pas boire aujourd'hui.
Je ne vais pas boire aujourd'hui.
Today, I'm going to eat at three o'clock.
Aujourd'hui, je vais manger à trois heures.
So let's learn a more polite way of asking.
How much do I owe you ?
How much do I owe you ?
Do you think the word franc is masculine or feminine ?
It's masculine because you said 1 franc.
What is the feminine form of 1 ?
Ask how much do I owe you today ?
How much do I owe you ?
How much do I owe you ?
Here is how to say 12 francs.
Notice how certain numbers, when you say them all alone, have a final consonant sound,
but when you say them together with another word, they lose it.
Ask, do I owe you 5 francs?
Est-ce que je vous dois 5 francs?
Est-ce que je vous dois 5 francs?
Est-ce que je vous dois 12 francs?

Je ne vais pas très bien.
Est-ce que vous voudriez manger quelque chose?
Est-ce que vous voudriez boire quelque chose?
Non, je voudrais boire de la bière.
De la bière, s'il vous plaît.
De la bière, s'il vous plaît.
Now you'll have a conversation with the young woman.
Imagine that she is a saleswoman in a store.
You make some purchases and then you disagree with her about the price.
For every price she mentions, correct her by saying one fraction.
less than she asks you for.
Begin by asking her how much your purchase costs.
Mais non, mademoiselle, je vous dois 12 francs.
Non, je ne vous dois pas 11 francs.
This lesson of Speak and Read Essential French 1 provides reading practice.
